text: Eduardo Lourenço GCSE, GCIH (23 May 1923 – 1 December 2020) was a Portuguese essayist, professor, critic, philosopher, and writer. He was a professor at the University of Coimbra. He won the Camões Prize in 1996.Lourenco, Eduardo. Chaos and Splendor and Other Essays. Edited by Carlos Veloso. Dartmouth, MA: Center for Portuguese Studies and Culture, UMass-Dartmouth, 2002. Lourenço was born in Almeida, Portugal. Lourenço died on 1 December 2020 in Lisbon at the age of 97.Morreu Eduardo Lourenço, gigante do pensamento português ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Portuguese writers Category:Philosophers Category:Literary critics Category:Portuguese academics Category:Essayists
title: Eduardo Lourenço
